::Feline::

She saw Zardus come and help her out. "Thanks Zardus for the help." 
She smiled at him, then fired her optic lazars on Blender. Her side 
leaking and wires were exposed.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Tiles are done, and I'm back!
> 
> Happy birthday, Dcoburn!
> 
> Airshadow, I think Hell Beast did notice your probes.
> 
> ::Zardus/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/DevilDuer/Havoc/Repressor::
> 
> Zardus dodges a shot, looking down at the battle to see Blender 
attacking 
> Feline. He growls, his jetpack powering down as he drops toward 
Blender, 
> slashing his sword at the bot's back as he lands.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> A shot hits Bloodystrike in the chest, sending him flying backwards 
before 
> regaining stability.
> 
> He aims carefully at Shockaract, firing off two missiles. He frowns 
as he 
> notices a femm laying in stasis lock on the ground (Vamprah), 
gliding in and 
> landing near her.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Reptilica opens his eyes, going out of stasis lock. He was drenched 
with mech 
> fluid, but he was still somewhat functional.
> 
> A stray blast nearly hits him in the head, Reptilica realizing that 
he was in 
> a battle. He gets up, running for the shuttle in which he had 
brought the Vok.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer watches Najah eat a small mammal, smiling as the bot asks 
where the 
> battle is.
> 
> "Right this way, follow me!" he says, taking off at a run toward 
the Alliance 
> base.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Havoc shakes slightly as shots hit his armor, regaining stability 
as he 
> climbs up in the air after dropping a bomb.
> 
> "Agreed," he replies to Demolition, then switching his comm-link to 
transmit 
> to all the Warmachines, "Time show these bot that battle with us 
means death. 
> Warmachines, UNITE!"
> 
> With those words, Havoc transforms into a huge torso, waiting for 
the other 
> Warmachines to transform into the other bodyparts.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Hearing Havoc's command, Repressor transforms into a leg, hatching 
onto 
> Havoc. He feels himself lose control as Havoc's mind takes over his 
circuits, 
> waiting for the others to combine.
